name: Surviving The Season: Stand Up Comedy Show
description:
Come watch a lineup of sharp-witted comedians ready to roast the chaos and toast the cheer of wedding season!

You are cordially invited... to join us at the Imperial Pub for an uproarious evening that celebrates and lampoons matrimonial madness!

Our monthly show features local comics performing their best material to help you survive the season. It's the perfect opportunity to unwind, enjoy, and laugh. 

The Wedding Singer: A mid-way musical medley with matrimonial musings!
The Best Man - or - Maid of Honour: Your hilarious headliner with credits such as Canada's Got Talent, Just For Laughs, JFL Toronto and Vancouver, the Winnipeg and Halifax Comedy Festivals, Roast Battle Canada, CBC Gem, Crave, CTV, and CBC Radio's Laugh Out Loud.

name: Dubai Chocolate Class
description:
Make the viral and super famous Dubai Chocolate with us! Discover the secrets behind this rich, luxurious treat inspired by the chocolatiers of Dubai. 

In this class you will learn:
How to temper chocolate for a glossy finish and perfect snap, you will make a few variations of this delicious chocolate bar including a vegan one. 
Techniques for moulding, filling, and decorating your chocolates with kataifi, pistachio and tahini.

Whether you're a chocolate lover, an aspiring chocolatier, or simply looking for a unique experience, this class is perfect for anyone who wants to create their own Dubai-inspired chocolates from scratch. 

Please note, classes may be held in our upstairs studio which is accessible by stairs only.

name: The Great Canadian Comedy Festival
description: 5 Days of comedy shows featuring comedians from around the world.
